name: Glass every single part of firefox 3.5
description:
The lazy mans approach to glass every part of firefox including web content. Works with the default theme of firefox 3.5.

Due to the character limit on userstyles.org i had to separate the style 19128 from this style, and to top it off you can grab the style 19127 style.
additional_info:
*************   NOTE     **********************

Your firefox is not frozen you need to hover over the firefox icon on your task bar and click the thumbnail to refresh the screen whenever you turn on or off the style

As the title states this will enable glass on every part of firefox, this includes web content (see makondo's pic), Vista will not apply glass to web content when maximized. You will need to use a style for each website to make full use of this style. If you do not wish to have the glass applied to websites that you do not have a style for i would suggest you use this with |2eason's white list modded glasser,  you can find a tutorial for that with the needed files at http://www.sevenforums.com/tutorials/13665-firefox-enable-aero-glass-transparency.html
